title: The Fat Years
description: Banned in China, this controversial and politically charged novel tells the story of the search for an entire month erased from official Chinese history. Beijing, sometime in the near a month has gone missing from official records. No one has any memory of it, and no one could care less€”except for a small circle of friends, who will stop at nothing to get to the bottom of the sinister cheerfulness and amnesia that have possessed the Chinese nation. When they kidnap a high-ranking official and force him to reveal all, what they learn€”not only about their leaders, but also about their own people€”stuns them to the core. author: Chan Koonchung
